titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize the appointment of health care professionals to the positions of the Surgeon General of the Army, the Surgeon General of the Navy, and the Surgeon General of the Air Force.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
Committee on Armed Services requested executive comment from Department of Defense.
Referred to Subcommittee on Manpower and Personnel (Arm Serv).

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Requires the appointment by the President of health-care professionals to the positions of the Surgeon General of the Army, the Surgeon General of the Navy, and the Surgeon General of the Air Force.
